events.message: The insured has reported a car accident involving their vehicle hitting a tree on May 1st, requesting to open a claim file immediately.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of the collision and involved vehicle damage.
An experienced claims agent specialized in vehicle accidents has been assigned to handle this customer's case for faster resolution.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of their claim and providing initial instructions on next steps.
The customer was requested to submit a police report, photos of the damaged car, and a detailed statement about the accident circumstances.
Customer has successfully submitted all requested documents, including accident report, vehicle photos, and contact details of witnesses.
The claims investigation team has begun reviewing submitted evidence and contacting involved parties to verify accident details.
Investigation has concluded with findings supporting the insured's version of events and confirming liability coverage eligibility.
A settlement offer was proposed based on damage estimates and policy terms to cover car repairs and related costs.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and thanked the claims team for their timely communication and support.
The claim has been officially approved with settlement terms confirmed, allowing payment processing for vehicle repairs.
Settlement payment was issued to the insured's bank account to cover repair costs as per the approved claim amount.
After confirmation of payment receipt and customer satisfaction, the claim case has been officially closed.
The claim documents and records have been securely archived for future reference, completing the entire claim lifecycle.
